question: Which country is the location of the event "La Linea corruption case"?
explanation: La Linea corruption case began in Guatemala on April 16, 2015, when the International Commission against Impunity in Guatemala and State prosecutors accused a number of politicians in the administration of President Otto Perez Molina of setting up a customs corruption ring with the help of high-ranking officials in the tax and customs administration. Several demonstrations ensued, calling for the resignation of Perez Molina and his vice-president Roxana Baldetti.
